categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors

nodes.text: Joss Gower is an Australian stunt performer who doubled as Liam Neeson's Qui-Gon Jinn in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and as Hayden Christensen's Anakin Skywalker in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
Gower has also worked on various installments of the Harry Potter, James Bond and select war/historical drama films and mini-series productions.
